title: Sipz Fusion Cafe - Clairemont Mesa
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Take-out, Asian, Bakery, Fusion, Vietnamese
description: One of two locations; the second location is in North Park. Casual dining in a large space. Menu features a range of Asian style rice and noodles plates, mockmeat dishes, appetizers. Everything is vegan except for one dish (noted on the menu). Vegan sushi menu is available from 5pm. Its own bakery makes vegan treats and desserts.
